comment: Do not take this professor!!! She is unclear about assignments, she's rude, and does not know how to teach!

I have never been so miserable and frustrated with a professor. She is rude, inconsistent, and not clear about expectations.  Useless busy work. PPT every class. For such an important class, I have learned hardly anything. I am an A student, so it is not like I am a slacker. She single handedly ruins my day every Mon and Wed. AVOID AT ALL COST.
